title: WHEEL! OF! FORUMS!!!
body:
With this question correctly answered.
https://i.imgflip.com/1hy8uf.jpg

The wheel is spinning what fabulous circle jerk will we land on next?
http://ak-hdl.buzzfed.com/static/2013-09/enhanced/webdr06/26/16/anigif_enhanced-buzz-4200-1380225711-10.gif
Ashe's AP ratios too high? Minion armor stopping people from hitting challenger?
Find out after this brief commercial break on WHEEL! OF! FORUMS!

replies.body: My money's on Mordekaiser needing buffs.
he will get +3 ad this summer my dad works for riot
he do, he do
Pffffff. He needs nerfs. Mace man OP. Shreds HP bars like heavy metal. About as slow as somebody who ate heavy metal too.

Why not make a section in the wheel where it says,  "I'm bronze so I'll say everything is OP".
Fucking broken Shen nerf already he one shot me.
Ligntning Shen only way to go

{{champion:98}} (With 1000 AP)

"WAHAHAHA! I CAN DEAL UP TO 26% of your HP with an empowered auto. Meaning that I can deal up to 78% of your health in damage over three autos!"

{{champion:75}} (With 1000 AP) *Raises eyebrow*

"Bitch please."  *Throws down Spirit Fire and one shots Shen*

{{champion:1}} (With 722 AP) _giggles_

-throws down bear, misses horribly, bear chases down and murders with {{item:3116}} anyways-
Fucking broken aatrox he can't die. I'm too dumb to use ignite or grievious wounds. Rito nerf aatrox. GG

well, it can be quite difficult to kill him when he can have a rough total of about 7000 hp WITHOUT life steal and his W passive factored in due to multiple revives (passive and guardian angel)

factor those in on a bulky build along with his engage CC potential and he is quite a monster.

i've seen a whole team focus him and he doesn't die and when he's not focused, he can fight that whole team

Funnest thing to do on Aatrox is to nab a Guardian Angel and 1v5 (in norms). You still gonna die but they gotta kill you 3 times to do it.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

best part is when you gotta make them come back to you several times. like they kill you move on, see you again, go "oh yeah, he revives." SO they kill you and move on. Then you come back and you can visibly see their reactions in their characters like, "jesus man. i've killed you twice now _how are you still here_?"

team fight cleans up before you die a third time and walk away after having gotten popped twice and handing out zero deaths. Always a crowd favorite of mine.

Right next to the time i put Aatrox on baron while playing next to my brother and got myself a bowl of cereal while my champ was going 1v1 with the purple void hell worm. brother thought i was joking until i came back with frosted flakes right before Baron died.

for the life of me cant figure out why Rito refuses to buff him.

{{champion:26}} revives

ONCE-A-MOTHERFUCKING-GAIN BOIS!
yeah, he's still running on stats from years ago XD  if he gets buffed, first thing that's going to happen is he'll get nerfed into the ground so he can't stall-fest the LCS

Poppy and Yasuo are getting nerfed. Rengar is counterable. Riven and Teemo are just annoying more than OP.

Lee and Ahri are fucking stupid.

https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Fi.imgur.com%2F9nohQh4.jpg&imgrefurl=http%3A%2F%2Fimgur.com%2Fgallery%2F9nohQh4&docid=D_FVska4LtkzIM&tbnid=Fo_TK0FxJ9GiBM%3A&vet=1&w=478&h=361&bih=678&biw=1363&q=the%20joke%20over%20your%20head&ved=0ahUKEwjj9o7ozM_RAhWpi1QKHeFBBEoQMwgbKAAwAA&iact=mrc&uact=8
Ahri's fine. I wonder when the boards will jerk hard enough for her to get nerfed for no real good reason.

It's just super fun when someone has insane CC and DMG with no counterplay. I don't like playing against Lee or Ahri, but I don't ban Ahri as she can be easily dealt with by {{champion:157}}. No one really likes facing anything that can keep you CC'ed and 100-0 you in the span of a few seconds.

On second though mentioning Yasuo is a death sentence in these parts.

"Insane CC" is a 1-2s CC that most players max last? Insane damage where Ahri's damage is just barely enough to 100-0 a squishy when she isn't ahead and any amount of MR stops her burst in its tracks, assuming she isn't ahead?

No counterplay when she has the simplest counterplay there is of "Dodge the Skillshot?"

>Ahri is stupid

sure.. totally not super telegraphed

> [{quoted}](name=Dabrick01,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QyBPsR3j,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-19T18:52:31.834+0000)
>
> Poppy and Yasuo are getting nerfed. Rengar is counterable. Riven and Teemo are just annoying more than OP.
> 
> Lee and Ahri are fucking stupid.

The nerf to Yasuo on 7.2 is not necessarily a nerf. The bonus AD ratio added to his E will actually buff his late game by a lot.

NOPE!

He ends up with a pretty sizable damage loss in the early game. With the new 20% AD scaling that DOES NOT receive the 50% increase on multiple dashes, he ends up with about the same dmg. It is a nerf to his early game and a insignificant hit to his late. I like it.
Actually his numbers come out lower than before on his usual build since he doesn't stack up that much ad with his items.

The average build for me is {{item:3046}}, {{item:3031}}, {{item:3072}}, {{item:3006}} or {{item:3111}}, {{item:3026}}, and a {{item:3139}} or {{item:3153}}. 

For this post I'm going to build {{item:3046}}, {{item:3031}}, {{item:3072}}, {{item:3006}}, {{item:3026}}, and {{item:3139}}.

I will also be calculating with no runes or masteries as that changes from player to player and it's hard.

So based on my build I'll have about 210 Bonus AD at level 18. I know I can get more, but this is my average build.

The scaling is 20% of Bonus AD, so that would add about 42 AD to my E. The base damage was lowered to 60/70/80/90/100. The bonus damage on multiple dashes is only applied to the base damage.

On my second dash, with all this in mind, I should have 150+42=192.

Of course, you could gorge yourself on AD if you wanted and give up the GA and replace the scimitar, but this is what I build.

All in all, this nerf hits his early game, which was a bit too strong.

Just build {{item:3046}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3072}} (or {{item:3812}})  and even {{item:3053}} to win.

Top lane bruiser yas OP

I mean, yeah, but that is even LESS ad for his scaling.

Also, you seem to be forgetting the best build.

{{item:3078}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3026}}

#RipTanksuo

Oh, I'm not worried about damage scaling, I'm just worried about doing enough damage to be a pest and the ability to lifesteal to survive 1v5s.

-laughs maniacally-

Wait I got bursted?

Oh well, {{item:3026}} .
Only if you disregard the bonus for stacking.
The bonus on the stacking does not apply to the full dmg, only to the base dmg. With enough AD, he will reach the damage he has now on live.

That's the point.

I won't be better, only even at best.
Haven't seen a good {{champion:412}} and {{item:3302}} "bug report" in awhile. Those get old though.

Being completely honest and Gameplay...

I haven't seen that shit working at all... Maybe I'm stupid... Probably stupid
Not melee, so no execute. Great item on support Veigar tho for Q farm.
Oh son of a...
Aqua! You're back! Again!
_I'm always here... Always watching..._
_Me, too_
Oh god... Who let the ship lord out of his cage
[*watches from the shadows and fades away*]
I SEE YOU, WE HAVE CONTROL WARDS... YOU POST RWBY AND DON'T SHIP BOARD MEMBERS, YOU'RE GOOD
Hopefully they don't ship champs either.

Minion armor OP?

I'm dying. XD
Nah, everyone is going to go back to Yasuo. No doubt about it since half of the people on the gameplay boards are a joke.

_Half?!_

Please, there are like, 10 people tops who make good posts there.

"Game is boring now. <Any previous season> was more fun, more strategic and overall better. It had no problems. At all. Ever. If you ported <previous season> into this year the game would be perfect."
Honestly, it's been ages since I've last seen a {{champion:53}} complaint, I think we're overdue for some.
